description: A scuba diver in full gear is violently ejected from a river onto a snowy bank, propelled by a bear swimming below. Two other bears are also in the water; one holds a fish, while the largest bear floats serenely downstream. The scenario presents an absurd reversal of typical human-animal interactions in a wilderness setting, where bears unexpectedly dominate and manipulate the aquatic environment, disrupting the diver's underwater activity.
